long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Magento Lens" Chrome extension is a tool designed for developers and specialists working with the Magento platform. It enables efficient browsing and inspection of uiComponents, providing real-time updates.

Key features of the "Magento Lens" extension:

- Browse & real-time inspection of uiComponent
- CustomerData explorer
- Components source code, their templates and assigned mixins inspection
- Translations explorer

CHANGELOG:
1.2.0
- added Translations explorer 
- component source code and assigned mixins inspection in context inspector

1.1.0
- changed ui to chrome-like
- added support for light/dark mode
- added multi language support
- added context inspector in Devtools > Elements
- added component template preview
- added search in components tree

1.0.0 
- initial release
